channel.title: Making me the owner/admin
channel.description:
ok, i made a server using nixscape source, as i have no idea where to get testscape apart from rapidshare but that dont work -,-
anywayz, i do what the tuts tell me, go in client.java, search for what it tells me to search, but it aint there, i also edited the character file in notepad, put my rights as 3 but when i log in nothing changes, then when i go back onto my character file, my rights have gone back to 0, and yes i did save it ...
any help plz?
thanks .. own ..
